import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Validation from './SignupValidation' function Signup() { const[values,setValues]=useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '' }) const [errors,setErrors]=useState({}) const handleInput=(event)=> { setValues(prev=>({...prev,[event.target.name]:[event.target.value]})) } const handleSubmit=(event) => { event.preventDefault(); setErrors(Validation(values)); } return (

) } export default Signup
